entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
